name: Anthony Bowers
text: Once on the yard in and out. Follow processor and no problem.

name: TommyCM72
text: Had a negative attitude. How are you supposed to know we're here? I'd suggest looking out the window.

name: Billy Thomason
text: Got in and out in no time flat.q

name: R Mack
text: Never have a hard time getting loaded here

name: Jonathan Martin
text: Took no time getting loaded

name: Tanya Chandler
text: Very organized  and professional workplace.

name: wes adkins
text: Not too big of a company for the little man. Awesome communication and the best price in dothan. Robert the delivery driver was a true professional at the concrete biz and was not only 15 minutes early but was super helpful. I will do all of my future business with quality ready mix. The name says it all.

name: William Hernández
text: Lost all day waiting for a truck load that never arrived. I Got blamed in the process. Not contacting them for future projects.

name: Joann Floyd
text: The Female owner bad attitude will spend my money somewhere else next time

name: Josh Suggs
text: One of their drivers passed me speeding through a work zone. As he passed concrete from the chute hit my truck windshield and passenger window. When I called to tell them about the incident the only response I got was “I don’t know what to tell you other than contact your insurance company”.

name: Tara Flowers
text: They still have beautiful flowers for sale. Very few Bonnie plants. They also have plenty of seeds but if you are looking for collards or turnips look elsewhere.

name: James “Jay” Casey
text: Looking for great plants for your garden this summer?  Home Depot at Crestwood Festival Center even has heirloom varieties of tomato plants you will not find other places.

name: Donald Mobley
text: Pick up some stone for a job

name: D.J Izlit
text: The workers are goofy. Place is pretty big but not worthy of anyone’s time.

name: Amy Roberts
text: I do know incoming loads you go to building 12 to check in and for all pick up loads you go to 14 to check in, then drive round to the right go to sign and stop & walk in to Bay 4 to check in.

name: Earnest Gann
text: Fast, friendly, service

name: James Auble
text: It hasn't been the best experience for me.

name: Chad Holloway
text: Good customer service

name: marcus graham
text: Always  a good place  to  deliver to

name: Thomas Dougherty
text: Great

name: DK Bright
text: I hear they don't pay their employees very well and only one weeks vacation.   You would think a Fortune 500 company would have better compensation for their employees.

name: Allen Rhodes
text: Terrible when they do road construction. Mccartney and the others don't hold up traffic near as long as fulcan . When paving boiling springs road the literally make you wait 15 minutes in some of the worst traffic caused them I've ever seen.

name: Earnest Gann
text:
Great quality
Great service
Friendly people

name: NOT SURE
text: Lime stone.

name: C Taylor
text: Helpful and knowledgeable employees. I have been here often. I actually pass up another improvement store to come to this one. Always have what I need and if they don't they will direct me where to go. The first time I came to this store was when we first moved to an area 35 miles from this store. I needed a Christmas tree. The Christmas trees were having a tuff year because of the drought. They replace the tree with a bigger one because I had to drive so far to come back. Super nice folks. I will continue to drive here for my home improvement needs.

name: Tracy Wyatt
text: Helpful people wonderful place to shop and they care about vets only one thing i have a promblem with is the garden center their plants are not taken care of and the empl oyees are familar with plants.

name: Mark Singleton
text: Found everything I needed except hosta plants

name: ERIC CARVER
text: Good folks

name: Shahari Pierce
text: They always have a great selection of plants and flowers. The deals aren't bad. I do wish they would take better care of the clearance section. When I go, a lot of them are usually knocked over and in dire need of water.

name: Maxine Bailey
text: Nice plants, plenty of seeds on display. Didn't find fingerling potatoes. Guess their spring supply of flowers will be in soon.

name: BYRDIE Yeah
text: They not only did not have what i wanted in stock. but they also had a sales agent in the garden center who absolutely had no knowledge about plants whatsoever. Nor was she willing to get off of her lazy ass to help a customer look either. She just sat there at the register and pointed to a section where she think it might be and began to say how they had them last week but dont know what is or isnt there now. Im like: uhh but you work here and you dont know what you have in stock of the main area where you work..smh

name: Teresa Davis
text: Great place to shop excellent customer service

name: Mary Reese
text: Nice, good prices

name: jamacia rudolph
text: Awesome flowers

name: Carol Federer
text: Wonderful place to e Sherman best concrete ever

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review!

name: Melinda Johnson
text: To whoever was driving truck #72019 I really appreciate your patience this morning for letting me get in front of you while it was pouring rain so I didn’t miss my turn thanks man

name: Bama Jayne
text:
We have been using Reynolds/USA concrete for 30 years and with all the economy ups & downs, this company has been solid. We've NEVER had an issue thas was not resolved asap, professionally.
We've had to use others, due to customer request,  but it's not the quality of mud we are accustomed to from USA.

Coastal Concrete, Inc.

name: Freda DuBose
text: We don’t use no one else

name: Janie Mclean
text: "Reynolds Ready Mix" company in Foley/Fairhope .."Would a reputable company tell you that they are not responsible for tearing up your yard when you have pictures of them doing so???" I'm a 64 year old woman who ordered concrete from this company. The manager told me it was my fault for not directing their truck driver correctly when they had TWO truck drivers here??  The Driver left a HUGE hole in my yard when his truck got stuck and the other concrete truck pulled it out...they left without a word to me and left me with a big mess...I Called the company and they told me that it wasn't their responsiblity to fix my yard even though they admitted tearing it up... I have several pictures of the stuck concrete truck.. Plus Pro-Centra painters were here to witness the mess that Reynolds Concrete did to my property...I would never ever recommend this company....NEVER...!

name: Andrea King
text: Greg and Johnny are super helpful

name: Samantha Hopkins
text: Going inside  the gardening center my first impression  was  the plants on the outside were not listed properly, several  perennial were under annuals and one plant had a arm of ants in it, next the stepping stones were very limited, I was looking for the octagon shaped one no luck, and the two hump barrier stone for flower beds were only in red which is disappointing, some of the plants were a little high considering the condition, also I'd love to know the name of some that happen to be in a planter assortment, left  me wondering.  I didn't like that some were very little detail on the information label but we do have Google  so I can't  complain too much. The cashiers seem to runaway if a customer comes to pay it was very unprofessional and also a waste of my time having to go find both cashiers "helping" customer, one literally was just watching.

name: Kyndall Reynolds
text: The garden center attendant was very knowledgeable of the products and helpful in us choosing a zero turn mower, bagger, and tiller.

name: Barry “Baw” Williams Sr.
text: Awesome!very helpful workers who can help you and know what they talking about too!

name: SandiB
text: Bought a new lawn mower on sale. Was $249 on sale for $186. Troybilt

name: Lora Benson
text:
Cashier was very courteous to her own kind.
Let some guy that just walked up go before me in line. Never ask how I was today like the other patrons whom she had full conversation with. But I did ask her how she was. No-one to help load or unload. All common for this location. Makes you want to drive 10 miles out of the way to Lowes.

name: Juanvinetta Elliott
text: Didn't  have everything I needed but I did get somethings

name: Paul Burnette
text: They didn't have the part that I was trying to find.....

name: Robert Turner Sr
text: Everything were nice and clean. Everyone we're frendly, speaking, wanting to help.as usually. Thanks.

name: elonzo taylor
text: Very neat...found what I was looking for with no problem.

name: Steven Dillon
text: Had what I needed and great price

name: Ron Terry
text: Nice place to visit

name: ohms0704
text: Good

name: Jessica Hunter (summer)
text: Love my concert boys ex pork chop in foley he is just the sweetest sexiest guy ever lol!!!!

name: Crystal Ramos
text: Amazing group to work with

name: David Pham
text: The price is extremely good here and the helpers are great.  The price is softer than homedepot and low.  I will come back

resp.text: Thank you, David. The lumber market is challenging right now. We do our best to keep our prices competitive, our product in stock and our service levels high. Thank you for your kind words. We appreciate your review and your business.

name: William Bowden Jr
text: Always a wonderful experience with this Company. Lowest prices, always stocked, great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review. It's definitely been a challenging year for lumberyards (and our customers)! We appreciate your kind words and your business. Please let us know if there's anything we can do to service you even better.

name: Wood Kirk Works
text: Even though the staff seemed knowledgeable about the products offered here, the vibe of this business is pretentious to say the least. I came in with my girlfriend and her son. We came within 6 ft of several middle-aged employees and weren't greeted once. I had to approach the counter and ask for what I needed (which they didn't have) then I was left to my own devices finding anything else useful in the store. This could have been tolerable if it weren't for the same employees greeting other customers with warm, inviting hellos and good wishes.

resp.text: We apologize that you did not feel seen and appreciated in our store. We pride ourselves on customer service, whether its to contractors who come in every day or first time shoppers. We are fully open to the public and value our customers equally. We failed to demonstrate that. We hope you'll give us another opportunity to earn your business.

name: Jabaria Dent
text: Good customer service. And their wood prices beat Lowe's

resp.text: Thank you for this review. We hope this helps new customers know that, while we are not a global corporation like Lowe's, our prices are  very often lower than the big box stores.

name: A T
text: I ordered fence pickets from them, paid over phone, and had delivered a week later no problem. I call back a few days later to ask if I can get a few more and am told they haven't had any in weeks and I must be confused about who I got them from. I call back the next day and am told there's 30 left but they don't take payments over the phone. It sounds to me like the employees each have their own rules they go by 🙄

resp.text: Hi. We apologize for our poor communication. We should have done a better job explaining the fence board situation. The market for fence boards is extremely turbulent right now. We are accustomed to having a ready supply in stock and ordinarily we would be happy to take an order over the phone and hold the inventory. However, because fence boards are in such high demand and we haven't been able to source them with the dependability of the pre-COVID days, we are discouraging our staff from reserving them, because the last thing we want is a customer to pay for a product, expect it, and we not have it in stock when they are ready for delivery.

name: Andrew O'Dell
text: Good lumber at a good price, knowledgeable and very helpful staff.

name: Manuela Smith
text: Was disappointed by employees knowledge and selling me the wrong tool to fit the screws I bought there.

resp.text: Hi Manuela. We remember you coming in yesterday. We apologize for disappointing you. It's often difficult to discern the size of a screw or bolt from a cell phone image. We suggested a product that would work on a range of bolt sizes, but unfortunately we didn't guess right. Thank you for your business and again we are sorry we weren't able to help you select the right product the first time.

name: Ray Keene
text: Great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Mr. Keene. We appreciate your business.

name: Priscilla Young
text: Friendly environment, eager to assist, fast service.

name: Michelle Morgan
text:
We have been remodeling our home and I have been looking for a front door for about 2 months now with no luck and very little enthusiasm to sell me a door.  I happen to stumble across Mobile Lumber and Yvette was a breath of fresh air when it came to picking out the perfect front door.  She was very knowledgeable, nice, fast and her follow through was great.  Within 24 hours she had my pricing and order placed for me, even saved me a trip back to West Mobile by handling everything over the phone.  Excellent customer service, I only wish we would had checked Mobile Lumber out at the beginning of our remodel adventure.

Thanks so much Yvette,

Michelle Morgan

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to give us this review. We appreciate it and so does Yvette. If there's anything else we can help you with in the future, please let us know.

name: Heather w
text: Went there a couple of Saturdays ago to look at front doors. Complete waste of time. We were not greeted when walking in, no one came over to assist us, or acknowledged us when we left. Not much selection out on the floor for what we were looking for and no customer service was offered.

resp.text: Hi Heather. We pride ourselves on our customer service, which is one factor that differentiates us from the big box stores. We failed to provide that experience to you and we apologize. Our team is very knowledgeable in exterior door options and we regret that we aren't able to help you select the perfect door for your home. We appreciate you coming in and hope you'll give us another chance.

name: 2SSRS 5th Gen
text: Prices are kinda high. But they also aren't MASKHOLES.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We agree, lumber prices are on the high side right now, but that's across the industry. Lumber is a commodity and prices fluctuate daily (sometimes hourly) depending on the market. We value our reputation for pricing our building materials extremely competitively. It's part of what has kept us around since 1975.

name: OBrien Holcombe
text: This place has been here for decades and at least 4 of those decades I have used them for many project needs. Good folks, wonderful environment and the men in the yard do not get enough praise. So here is to you gentlemen for doing such an outstanding job day in and day out.

resp.text: Brien, we certainly appreciate your support and patronage over the past 4 decades! We will pass this praise along to our guys in the yard. If we can do anything to make your experience even better, please don't hesitate to let us know.

name: Josh Lee
text: Friendly and speedy

name: N Vasko
text: Watch out, they do not always accept returns on some items and they will not give you a heads up

name: Stephen Williams
text: Great for any project.  Excellent contractor services as well.  Can usually fill a large order in a small amount of time.  Quality products, friendly staff and competitive pricing.  Delivery available.

name: Bernard Jackson Jr
text: Always prompt service at Mobile Lumber .

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. Some days are busier than others, but we understand the value of our customers' time and try to get you what you need efficiently so you can keep your jobs moving.

name: Conner Jung
text: My preferred place to buy my lumber and materials. The workers here can break down piece by piece on what you will need for anything you are building. The workers here go above and beyond for first time builders and professional builders. Would go here over Lowes or Home Depot in a heartbeat!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, Conner. We appreciate you and your business!

name: Conner Jung
text: My preferred place to buy my lumber and materials. The workers here can break down piece by piece on what you will need for anything you are building. The workers here go above and beyond for first time builders and professional builders. Would go here over Lowes or Home Depot in a heartbeat!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, Conner. We appreciate you and your business!

name: Mike Price
text: This is the best hardware store in Mobile.  Much more a home town store.  They treat you like a person not a number.

resp.text: Mike, thank you for the kind words and for your patronage. We appreciate you!

name: Lee Roberts
text: Love mobile always have what i need at a great price. And awesome service been using them since it was staceys hardware.

resp.text: Lee, we appreciate your patronage and support after all these years!  Customers like you are the reason we've been able to to stick around and serve our community for 40+ years.

name: Sara Brunson
text: ML is a great place for all your building needs. The staff is Amazing.

resp.text: Thank you, Sara. We agree! ;)

name: Alvin Nelson
text: Local business ready to help.  They are busy so give yourself some time.

resp.text: Your review put a smile on our faces today! You're right-- we do get busy when the weather gets as pretty as it's been this week, but we do our best to get our customers in and out as quickly as we can. Thank you for your kind words and patience.

name: Ronnie Cliburn
text: The folks there are really friendly and helpful. They don't have the amount of different stuff the Lowe's and home Depot have, but I would rather go there and check first for what I need.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Ronnie. Let us know what you're looking for and we'll always be happy to help you find it, even if it's through another vendor, or we can often order it from our warehouse. See you soon!

name: Detroit Q
text: Some of the worst customer service I have ever experienced. I had never been to this place so I was unsure if customers were allowed to walk through the warehouse. Naturally I ask the clerk at the desk or at least tried to ask and when I say this guy gave the impression that he us too busy to deal with me. The guy wouldn't even stop typing or even give me the common decency of looking at me when he responded. At first I was thinking maybe I was asking to much due to me being a vet and being so use to people at least looking at you to acknowledge your existence but when he proceeded to continue typing and responding with very short answers I knew then it wasn't me. Everyone is entitled to a bad day and I get that but you work in the customer service industry for God sakes. A little hospitality would go a long way. I guess it's on to the next lumber yard.

name: Paul Miller
text: I shopped around and ended up doing my business here.  Well priced and very helpful

name: Eric Linsley
text: Great service. Best trim moulding prices in town!

name: Mark James
text: Good place to get all your buildings needs

name: Katherine Winslow Austill
text:
The items I purchased were not available & what was available was not 1st quality.

None of the items offered for pick-up were straight & defect free.

I had to be very firm in my demand for a full refund.

The experience took over 1.5 hours to:
1) place the order
2) have the order hand written
3) pay for the order
4) drive around to pick up the order
5) walk inside and inform of the poor quality and insufficient quantity
6) walk back out to pick up to show inside sales the poor quality and insufficient quantity
7) walk back inside to ask - then demand a refund
8) wait while the entire order was again hand written and wait for my refund

A complete waste of time.
1.5 hours to accomplish nothing.

resp.text: Hi Katherine. We hate hearing that you had such a bad experience at our store! We are trying to track down your transaction to figure out what happened so it won't happen in the future. Providing an excellent customer service experience is very important to us! Would you be willing to talk to our store manager Lee to help us understand what happened? You can reach him at 661-8000. Again, we are sorry for any inconvenience we caused you.

name: Denise Keaton
text: Don't go anywhere else to pay high dollar for bad wood.  Come to Mobile Lumber and get the good stuff from people who care.

name: Sam Walters
text: Great prices, nice people that work there.

name: Mark Byrd
text: Lennor is great to work with in Commercial Sales

resp.text: We think so too! Thank you for your review and your business, Mark!

name: Ronnie Wilson
text: OUTRAGOUS PRICING ON A PLAIN OLE #2 10' 1X4' PINE 2.50SOMETHING EACH ARE YOU KIDDING?? REDICULOUS

resp.text: Hi Ronnie. We pride ourselves on offering competitive pricing on our building materials. We'll be happy to match our competitors' pricing on this item if you find it for lower.

name: mike piliponis
text: Better quality than Lowes

name: James Callaway
text: Very helpful great staff !!!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review. We appreciate your support!

name: Kel Moy
text: Some deals here

name: Johan Arcenal
text: Cheap

name: Vanessa
text: This company has a track record for never having the right lumber delivered at the right time. Time = money. As I'm watching the framing company wait for Mobile Lumber to bring the materials to Dauphin Island as I type this, I'm wondering why it's Tuesday and they've wasted all our time. You should fire your lumber salesman...

name: William J Fulford
text: They getting better

resp.text: Thank you for noticing!  We've implemented some new practices in our yard to increase efficiencies for our customers. Our goal is to be always improving.

name: Mollie Newsome
text: I like this place because it's a garden Center! I love to be around growing things. The staff are very helpful and seem to know what they're talking about.

name: Arlene Dean
text:
We have shopped here several times & have found what we needed nearly every time. Most recently a gentleman helped us in the plumbing department & knew more about the issue we were having than the so called plumber we hired (that came to our home twice & still didn't fix the issue).
The water refill tube the Home Depot employee opened for us to test, and sold to us, fit perfectly & solved our problem.
We also purchased our holiday tree & holiday greenery at this location.  Nick, the helpful young man that trimmed & wrapped the tree for us, did a perfect job. We have lived in a variety of cities and states and this is hands down our favorite Home Depot location.

name: Scamuel Jones
text: This place is a total loser.  I could not find two common plants I was looking for in the lawn & garden.  Then I clicked to "chat" and was told I was #1 in the queue and then no one ever chatted!  I would suggest not even wasting your time at Home Depot for anything.  Try Lowe's or local nurseries, since these people totally IGNORE their customers!

name: Mason
text: Helpful staff but they often don't have what I'm looking for.

name: Amy Clement
text:
I live just down the street from this Home Depot and EVERY time I go into this store, I can never find anyone to help me.  It looks like a ghost town at the front of the store.  Are you under staffing this store, or are the employees hiding in the back?  I will say that I mostly come to this store after 5pm usually.

I thought it was important to let you know this because if things do not improve, I will just go across the street to Lowe's where they have always been more than happy to help me.  Your store is my neighborhood store, and I want to see you succeed and not go under because of poor management decisions with either hiring bad employees or not paying your staff enough to care about the customers.

Thanks!

name: T Denton
text: I purchased garden soil for blueberry plants.

name: Monika Askew
text: Had to load 40 bags of mulch by myself.  I told the cashier I would need help but he didn't call anyone.  Meanwhile, there were 2 guys loading pine straw and didn't offer to help.

name: Timothy Taylor
text: My wife and I were looking for something to replace the old plastic edging around our flower beds and some fresh soil to work into the beds. No problems there. We got ready to check out, and Home Depot decided to do their best Walmart impression...9 or 10 customers waiting to check out, only 1 register open.😖  After about 12-15 minutes in line, the second register finally opened.

name: Diane Lewis
text: Love the garden center, beautiful flowers they had a sale on potting soil, good deal but no one there to help I have a bad hand and needed help with soil but couldn't find any one

name: Bobby Gilliland
text: very good in every way.

name: Bryan McElroy
text: Home and garden building supplies tools.

name: Ultreya Park
text: Fantastic experience. Super helpful guy (and beautiful resident black cat) who exchanged, without problem, a plant I bought a few weeks ago that perished. Much more room than some garden centers, making it easy to get around with wide aisles. Lots of variety in annuals and perrenial plants and all the rest, pots, rocks, soil and anything for outside. Wish they would keep the garden center gates open when the store is open for that last hour shopping errand.

name: Jared Persons
text:
Just purchased a big grille!!!!
Home depot employee from lighting DEPT , stopped what he was doing to help me wheel grille to register and then outside to my trailer to help load it up.
He could of easily sent me on a wild goose chase to find someone in the lawn and garden section, but he didn't.....That's hard to find these days in retail stores...

name: Bit Bucket
text: It was good for us today! Because of the freezing weather, herbs were knocked down to 3 bucks. Some of them were not hurt.

name: lovesickforone
text: Loved thier garden dpt.! Great plants...good variety

name: Christopher Brown
text: Drove from Bayou la Batre they had only part of what I needed but they just out. Big selling I belive

name: Judith Word
text: The garden department staff & all employees and management here have been very friendly and helpful

name: Russell Pilling
text: I live in Theodore and went to Lowe's first waited forty minutes to be told by the man in lawn and garden he would be there soon waiting for another fifteen minutes went to Home Depot got a riding mower and gone in fifteen minutes that's faster than Jimmy Johnson LOLOL

name: hector macias
text: ,,love shopping here everytime a make a delivery,,
